title: How to Show Your Framerate in Counter Strike: Source

steps.title: Join a server and begin playing.
steps.content: Join a server and begin playing.

steps.title: Open up the console in-game by pressing the tilde (~) key which is located above the Tab key.
steps.content: Open up the console in-game by pressing the tilde (~) key which is located above the Tab key.

steps.title: Look in the top right hand corner of the screen - there should be a number in a small font.
steps.content: Look in the top right hand corner of the screen - there should be a number in a small font. The FPS rate will be either red (below 50 FPS), yellow (50-60 FPS) or green (more than 60 FPS) or white (more than 100 FPS).
